title: How many ranked games have you played for each season?
body:
I think it would be interesting to know the amount of ranked games we have each played with each season, 
I started playing ranked in 2012 season, 66 games
my play time seemed to have peaked in the 2013 season, 513 games
and with the 2014 season winding down I'm only at 87 games.

How about you? What season was your most active, and least active?
